title: Can we have a "reported player" report card?
body: I'd like to know very generally if the things I'm reporting players for are genuine, consistent, and garnering results.

replies.body:
This would be nice, and greatly increase overall report accuracy and behavior, i would think.

I believe riot fears it would allow people to figure out how the system works and bypass it, oddly.
